home.title: Time2Gather
home.description: A service that makes it easy to schedule meetings with people. Create meetings, select multiple dates and time slots, and share them. When participants select their available times, we'll recommend the best date and time to meet.

login.title: Ready to schedule?
login.description: Log in easily with KakaoTalk and schedule your meeting.

descriptionStep.heading: What kind of meeting is this?

notFound.title: Meeting Not Found
notFound.description: The meeting you requested does not exist or has been deleted.

404.description: The page you requested does not exist or has been deleted.
